Today I’m making some big announcements around education. It’s about helping our kids do better at school.
Busy day! Multiple stops in Israel, received an honorary doctorate, and arrived in Jordan: http://t.co/DDiqysORB0 #cdnpoli #PMTour
I’ve just given my first speech of the year - it sets the scene for 2014 & details a big new investment in education http://t.co/F9AWlTeybC
We’re investing an extra $359m over 4 years into teachers & principals to help our kids do better in school http://t.co/4KvwRaBZjJ
Our new $359m investment in education will help teachers & principals lift student performance in every school: http://t.co/8t2WxsqHPb
Evidence clearly shows the quality of teaching is the most important factor in a child’s education. http://t.co/i7iwH21EqI
Tomorrow I meet with His Highness, King Abdullah, and Prime Minister Abdullah Ensour in Jordan. http://t.co/DDiqysORB0 #cdnpoli #PMTour
The next step in our plan to raise achievement is to recognise excellent teachers and principals. http://t.co/XqIHl2Eiho
Q300 million will be transferred to #Mineduc so that it can count on the resources that allow it to guarantee free education.
As Executive, we will continue to work so that the delivery of resources can be fulfilled so that education can continue to advance.

The UAE ranked first in the world in the Edelman Confidence Index 2014. The UAE is the world's first in trust in government and the world's first in confidence in the economy
New York-based Edelman said plans and strategies launched by the UAE government have increased confidence in its performance over the past period
What pleased me in this achievement is that the UAE has been the world's highest increase in this index .. From the sixth position of the world's first in one year ..

The trust of the people in the government under the leadership of my brother, Sheikh Khalifa, came as a result of their proximity to the people, their need for them, and their flexibility in responding to their demands.
The UAE government will continue to develop ... and will remain close to its people. As one team we will rise from the summit of the next, God willing.

The UAE govt. and business won the first place worldwide in trust according to 2014 Edelman Trust Barometer
According to Edelman, the NY based company, the UAE's plans and strategies contributed to the trust in performance it earned over the year
It's great to see the rapid progress for the UAE from the 6th to the 1st place over the period of one year only
The people's trust in the govt. is a result of the leadership closeness to them and attending to their needs and demands
